
 Seam International Module
 3.0.0.Beta1

 What is it?
 ===========

 The Seam 3 International Module is focused on a unified approach to configuring
 your application for the right language and locale, propagating them to all
 parts of the application.

 Contents of distribution
 ========================

 artifacts/
 
    Provided libraries

 lib/

    Dependencies

 docs/

    API Docs and reference guide.
  
 Licensing
 =========

 This distribution, as a whole, is licensed under the terms of the Apache
 License, Version 2.0 (see license.txt).

 Seam International URLs
 =======================

 Seam 3 Int'l Module:  http://www.sfwk.org/Seam3/International
 Seam 3 Home Page:     http://www.sfwk.org/Seam3
 Downloads:            http://www.sfwk.org/Seam3/DistributionDownloads
 Forums:               http://www.sfwk.org/Community/Seam3Users
 Source Code:          http://github.com/seam/international
 Issue Tracking:       http://issues.jboss.org/browse/SEAMINTL

 Release Notes
 =============

3.0.0.Beta1
-----------

3.0.0.Alpha3
------------

 * [SEAMINTL-8] - Add support for JDK TimeZone
 * [SEAMINTL-10] - Modify Events for changing User Locale and TimeZone
 * [SEAMINTL-11] - Locale string definition to support hyphens and underscores
 * [SEAMINTL-17] - Simplify default config qualifier names for locale and time zone
 * [SEAMINTL-18] - Migrate to Seam Solder
